it.polimi.se2019.client.view

Class GuiController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.client.view.GuiController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UiDispatcher, EventDispatcher, Observer<Event>, javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GuiControllerBoard, GuiControllerPowerUp, GuiControllerTable, GuiControllerWeapon

    public abstract class GuiController
extends Object
implements Observer<Event>, javafx.fxml.Initializable, UiDispatcher
    Controller for javaFX fxml files contained in files/fxml, every implementation manages one or more fxml all linked to a specific section of the GUI
